comment: Kashmir m dikhaate wo guda ham.
amr:
# ::snt Kashmir m dikhaate wo guda ham.
(a / and
      :op1 (c / country
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Kashmir"))
      :op2 (d / dikhaate-00
            :ARG0 c)
      :op3 (h / ham
            :mod (g / guda)))

comment: Uske liye islamic jeher hona chahiye dimag mein
amr:
# ::snt Uske liye islamic jeher hona chahiye dimag mein
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / person
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Uske")
            :mod (c / country
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Israel")))
      :snt2 (p2 / person
            :mode expressive
            :name (n3 / name
                  :op1 "Hona"
                  :op2 "Chahiye")
            :mod (d / dimag)))

comment: Cartoon se hurt hoke kisiko maarne chale toh usko guda nhi bolte. Lol. Tumko pasand nhi aaya criticise karo.
amr:
# ::snt Cartoon se hurt hoke kisiko maarne chale toh usko guda nhi bolte. Lol. Tumko pasand nhi aaya criticise karo.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (h / hurt-01
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (c / Cartoon)
                  :op2 (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Hoke"
                              :op2 "Kisiko"))
                  :op3 (p2 / person
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Maarne"
                              :op2 "Chale"))))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (w / weko-polarity
                  :mod (g / guda))
            :op2 (b / bunte)
            :op3 (l / laugh-01
                  :mode expressive
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :manner (l2 / loud)))
      :snt3 (a3 / and
            :op1 (t / tumko-polarity)
            :op2 (n3 / nhi-a-aya)
            :op3 (c2 / criticize-01
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (p3 / person
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "Karo")))))

comment: Brainwash issi ko to bolte hai shahir khan

            :medium (l / language
                  :name n
                  :op1 "Brainwash")))

comment: wahi guda tere forefathers mei hota toh convert na hote!
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (g / guda
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Jesus"))
      :snt2 (p / person
            :ARG0-of (h / have-rel-role-91
                  :ARG2 (f / forefather)))

comment: Actually use gudda nahi bawasir kehte hai...

      :mode imperative

            :op2 (p2 / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "hawasir"))
            :op3 (p3 / person

comment: Ha sahi hai. Pagal kutte aur tum mein koi fark nahi hai waise bhi. Baaki Israel kaisa lagta hai??
amr:
# ::snt Ha sahi hai. Pagal kutte aur tum mein koi fark nahi hai waise bhi. Baaki Israel kaisa lagta hai??
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / sahi
            :mode expressive
            :mod (h / hai))
      :snt2 (k / kutte
            :mode expressive
            :mod (a / aur)
            :mod (m2 / mein
                  :mode expressive)
            :mod (f / fark
                  :mode expressive
                  :mod-of k)
            :mode expressive)
      :mod (n / nahi
            :mode expressive)
      :mod (w / wah
            :mode expressive)
      :mod (w2 / wah
            :mode expressive)
      :snt3 (k2 / kaki
            :mode expressive
            :mod (c / country
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Israel"))
            :mod (l / lag
                  :mode expressive
                  :mod (h2 / ha))
            :polarity (a2 / amr-unknown)))
